MACHINE LASER CALIBRATION &amp; BALL BAR</span><p style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_144571675"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 class="noclickel" style="display:inline;margin-top: -6px;">Category</h2><p><span title="Add Category" onclick="opencatPopup(144571675);" class="categeditbtn"><span class="emptyaddmoresign addmoresign">+</span>Add</span> <span> category to get buy leads from relevant customers</span></p></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(144571675)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_144571675" data-itemid="144571675" onclick="productdescpop(144571675)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">SPIN WINDOW - ( VISIPORT &amp; ROTOCLEAR) A clear view of the production processes under the toughest milling conditions. The spinning window is an approved system to keep inspection window clean and thus to ensure continuous control of work flow. ROTOCLEAR / VISIPORT is suitable for all kinds of metal cutting machines such as turning centers, milling machines, including machining centers and test stands . A rotating disc flings off striking coolants and cuttings, whether water-soluble or water-insoluble. This enables the operator to have a clear view into the processing area at all times – thus guaranteeing safety according to the applicable safety regulations. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_144571675" data-itemid="144571675" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="descidrbtn_160020639" data-itemid="160020639" onclick="productdescpop(160020639)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">&nbsp;STATIC STABILSIER : 10 KVA -200KVStatic Voltage&nbsp;Regulator (SVR) is made by using high frequency&nbsp;IGBT&nbsp;(Insulated Gate Bi-Polar Transistor) through 20 KHz&nbsp;PWM&nbsp;inverter&nbsp;based&nbsp;technology to maintain constant precise&nbsp;voltage. SVR will give Fully Uniform Conditioned Power.
Free from Surge-Spike-Brown-Outs.
Real-Time Precisely Regulated Voltage i.e. +/- 1%.
Very Fast Correction Time within 20ms i.e. One Waveform.
All Solid State Technology, No Moving Parts.
Silent Operation &amp; Minimum Maintenance.

class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Voltage Preventer" onclick="opencatPopup(128959888);">Voltage class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(128959888)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_128959888" data-itemid="128959888" onclick="productdescpop(128959888)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">We “RS Automation” are a Sole Proprietorship (Individual) based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Trader and Service Provider of Vertical Axis Drop Preventer, Laser Calibration Ball Bar Testing Service, etc.
Axis drop problem in CNC machines:
The introduction of Computer numerical control(CNC) machines radically
changed the manufacturing industry because of it is key advantages like high
accuracy and faster production. In one sense, CNC machines may be said to
represent special industrial robot systems ,as they are programmable to perform
any kind of machining operation.
Most of the manufacturing industries face problems in position control of
the vertical axis during machining on CNC machines in the event of an
unprecedented power failure .The axis slips downwards due to inertia and
gravitational force acting on vertical axis of CNC machines.
In case of die and mold applications, where the accuracy of jobs are
comparatively very high, the damages caused due to this problem a <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_128959888" data-itemid="128959888" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv128959888"><h2 style="display:inline;" AC</label><span class="">Three Phase 4 Wire R Y B E 220 / 415 V</span></li> <li class="SLC_pr"><label class="  ">Weight</label><span class="">3 Kgs.</span></li> <li class="SLC_pr"><label class="  ">Mounting</label><span class="">Panel Mounting</span></li> <li class="SLC_pr"><label class="  ">Cooling</label><span class="">Natural Air Cooling</span></li></ul><span onclick="productdescpop(155472755)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">ABB PM554-RP: A compact powerhouse for distributed automation. The ABB PM554-RP Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) delivers a powerful punch in a small package, making it perfect for dispersed automation applications. Consider it the brains of your smaller control systems, efficiently handling logic and communication tasks. AC500-based: Takes advantage of the proven technology and versatility of the ABB AC500 platform.v128 kB RAM: Enough memory for your control applications and data. 8 digital inputs/6 digital outputs: Addresses critical I/O requirements immediately, with extension options available. RS485 and 2x option slots: Enables connectivity with a variety of devices and modules, increasing functionality.
